t: 16:8*r Some manuscripts have the following ending between verses 8 and 9, and one manuscript has it after verse 8 (omitting verses 9-20): Then*i they*i quickly*i reported*i all*i these*i instructions*i to*i those*i around*i Peter.*i After*i this,*i Jesus*i himself*i also*i sent*i out*i through*i them*i from*i east*i to*i west*i the*i sacred*i and*i imperishable*i proclamation*i of*i eternal*i salvation.*i Amen.*i
